for testcases in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n = int(raw_input())
    L = map(int, raw_input().split() )
    #L = sorted(L)
    Maxc = 0
    Maxe = 1
    for elem in sorted(set(L)) :
        iterc = L.count(elem)
        if( iterc > Maxc ) :
            Maxc = iterc
            Maxe = elem
    print Maxe, Maxc
